00035 Segment3 Line3::shortestSegmentBetween(const Line3& l2) const
00036 {
00037   // minimize the squared dist function
00038   //  q(s,t) = | l1(s) - l2(t) |^2 where l1(s) = o+s*d & l2(t) = l2.o+t*l2.d
00039   // which is quadratic with determinant always >= 0  (0 => parallel lines)
00040   // can be written q(s,t) = as^2 + 2bst + ct^2 +2ds +2et + f
00041   //  where
00042   const Line3& l1(*this); // alias 
00043   Real a = dot(l1.d,l1.d);
00044   Real b = dot(-l1.d,l2.d);
00045   Real c = dot(l2.d,l2.d);
00046   Real d = dot(l1.d,o-l2.o);
00047   Real e = dot(-l2.d,o-l2.o);
00048   // & f = dot(o-l2.o,o-l2.o);
00049   
00050   Real det = a*c - b*b;
00051   Real s,t;
00052   if (Math::equals(det,0)) { // parallel
00053     t = 0; s = -d/a; // choose
00054   }
00055   else { // solution for dq = (0,0)
00056     Real acb2 = a*c - b*b;
00057     s = (b*e - c*d) / acb2;
00058     t = (b*d - a*e) / acb2;
00059   }
00060   
00061   return Segment3( o+s*l1.d, l2.o+t*l2.d );
00062 }
